messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Circuitry Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Engineering.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We're sensing an unusual amount of friendship going on aboard your station. Do we need to make adjustments?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Yes, that is most definetely a toxic amount of friendship. We're gonna have to get you guys outta there before you start watching gay cartoons and shit.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Holodeck - 1218 AD.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Oh now you've gone and done it. You've created a friendship singularity so dense you summoned a Friendship demon.

We're getting you out as fast as possible.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We've been ordered to pick you guys up and deliver you to Central Command. We're a few minutes away so hang tight.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Get on board, we don't have all day. All friends on the Friend ship!
